scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NUXT_ENV_API=dev nodemon server/index.js --watch server
scripts.dev:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NUXT_ENV_API=test nodemon server/index.js --watch server
scripts.dev:pre: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NUXT_ENV_API=pre nodemon server/index.js --watch server
scripts.dev:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NUXT_ENV_API=prod nodemon server/index.js --watch server
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nuxt build --no-lock && npm start
scripts.build:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nuxt build --no-lock && npm start
scripts.build:pre: cross-env NODE_ENV=pre nuxt build --no-lock && npm start
